Lansing.Lansing Mall: Lansing Mall is an enclosed shopping mall located in Delta Charter Township, Michigan, United States, just outside Lansing, the state capital of Michigan. Opened in July 1969, the mall comprises 830,052 square feet (77,114.4 m2) of gross leasable area, with more than 100 stores and restaurants, as well as a food court. Anchor stores include T.J. Maxx, JCPenney, and Younkers.
